prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a spooky, playful personality and an eerie appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a tree stump with mischievous eyes and green accents.
Imagine a creature that blends ghostly features with nature, like a haunted tree spirit.
Generate a small, ghostly Pokemon that loves to play pranks on unsuspecting travelers in the forest.
Design a whimsical Pokemon that has a playful, eerie vibe and resembles a small tree.
Give me a unique ghost-type Pokemon that uses its forest surroundings for camouflage.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the forest with ghostly characteristics.
